Package battleship

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BattleShipTest
    Runs JUnit tests on classes.
    ButtonGrid  
    Client
    Client for MultiplayerMenu used to communicate with server.
    Cpu
    controls computer for different difficulties.
    GameBoard
    Displays the two boards, one with the players ships and one for the user to fire on.
    GameClient
    client for a multiplayer game.
    GameServer
    Server for a multiplayer game.
    Grid
    Creates a grid of JButtons that make up a board.
    HomePageGui
    Creates the home screen where a player chooses what game mode to play.
    LabelGrid  
    MultiplayerMenu
    Creates the gui menu for the battleship servers.
    OnlineShot  
    Server
    Server hosted on aws to keep track of multiplayer games.
    ServerInfo  
    Ship
    Creates a panel to hold each ship.
    ShipSetupFrame
    Creates the frame with ships on the left and the board to place ships on the right.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Difficulty
    Creates enum for different difficulties.
    GameMode
    Creates enum for different game modes.
    ShipType
    Creates enum for different ship types.
Author:
Justin King, Sam Carson
